about_the_game:
Synopsis

Akuru x Ren's Story

Better Late Than Never

" Six months after their wedding, Akuru and Ren are spending their first Christmas together as wife and wife.
But while Ren is excited about the big event, Akuru is freaking out after hearing a rumor that her favorite mobile game,
Kensho, is shutting down!"
" Sinking into despair over the thought of never seeing her husbando('s new images) ever again,
she turns to her best friend Shino... but Shino has her hands full with her upcoming marriage introduction.
At the same time, Ren sets in motion a plan to cheer Akuru up by giving her a special present..."


Shino x Aira's Story

Shino's Marriage Introduction Makeover

"Just before Christmas, Shino is busy creating new doujin works for the annual end-of-year event.
Worried about her prospects for the future,
Shino's parents bring an unexpected proposal to the table—to set her up with a marriage introduction."
"Knowing that nothing can ever rival the love she has for her OTPs, Shino plans on turning it down; after all,
it wouldn't be fair on the other woman. However, Ren sees it as a chance to eliminate a rival, and encourages Shino to go for it.
Ren then enlists the help of fashion-conscious Aira to give Shino a movie-style makeover,
but the plan starts to veer off in an unexpected direction..."


Each track is included in MP3 and FLAC format.
Also includes mp4 with subtitles.
(English,Simplified Chinese,Traditional Chinese,Korean )
